body_html:
There seems to be some bugs/inconsistencies with the get_state_map function in native_module.py, where the variable scope was not merged in with the variable names.

It is also possible that the protobuf was updated with a newer version of Saver. Need to look into the details.

body:
There seems to be some bugs/inconsistencies with the get_state_map function in native_module.py, where the variable scope was not merged in with the variable names.

It is also possible that the protobuf was updated with a newer version of Saver. Need to look into the details.
